Self.exe

Critical Reflection

Breaking, reorganizing, reinterpreting

  1. Breaking apart Distilling dense drawings into modular fragments.
  2. Reorganizing Pinning fragments across walls to test rhythm.
  3. Reinterpreting Projecting shadows back onto paper to create new scores.
